attributes.action: Put traffic lights on the Royate hill, Bristol aquaduct.
attributes.background: The road currently runs on a give way traffic system. The traffic on this road is always busy, which causes major conjestion. I believe if traffic lights were put in place to give both sides equal opportunity to cross. This would significantly reduce congestion.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
